metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8165 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnernerability exists in rails < 5.2.4.3, rails < 6.0.3.1 that can allow an attacker to unmarshal user-provided objects in MemCacheStore and RedisCacheStore potentially resulting in an RCE.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
